researched_commit.message: Refactor advanced_langgraph_features.py to implement modern LLM-powered research tools, enhancing state management and feedback processing. Update workflow nodes for improved message handling and user feedback integration, ensuring compatibility with the latest LangGraph standards. Introduce async functions for web search, deep analysis, and synthesis, leveraging LLM capabilities for real-time insights and modifications.

prior_commit.message: Refactor AsyncErrorDetector and LangChain/LangGraph interceptors for improved error handling and monitoring. Introduce AsyncExecutionMonitor for asynchronous context management, enhancing performance tracking and error detection. Update example scripts to reflect changes in model initialization and checkpointing, ensuring compatibility with new dependencies and features.

commit_history.message: Refactor advanced_langgraph_features.py to implement modern LLM-powered research tools, enhancing state management and feedback processing. Update workflow nodes for improved message handling and user feedback integration, ensuring compatibility with the latest LangGraph standards. Introduce async functions for web search, deep analysis, and synthesis, leveraging LLM capabilities for real-time insights and modifications.

Refactor AsyncErrorDetector and LangChain/LangGraph interceptors for improved error handling and monitoring. Introduce AsyncExecutionMonitor for asynchronous context management, enhancing performance tracking and error detection. Update example scripts to reflect changes in model initialization and checkpointing, ensuring compatibility with new dependencies and features.

Update LangChain and LangGraph interceptors for modern compatibility, enhancing error detection and monitoring capabilities. Introduce new components for real-time event streaming, checkpoint operations, and human-in-the-loop features. Revise example scripts and README to reflect comprehensive monitoring and advanced features, ensuring alignment with current frameworks.
remove the vertex ai setup. use only api key instead

Enhance README and core components with intelligent error remediation features. Update error detection engine to support real-time remediation and prompt injection capabilities. Remove outdated LangChain and LangGraph examples to streamline the repository.

Remove demo.py and enhance README with Gemini integration details, including setup instructions and new features. Update requirements for Gemini dependencies and add Gemini management commands to CLI. Implement Gemini-powered error analysis and intelligent retry in Aigie's core error detection engine.

Enhance Aigie LangGraph demo with real-time monitoring and error detection features. Updated example to showcase actual interception, performance metrics, and state tracking during LangGraph operations.
